name: Tempest Domain
description: Tempest domain clerics call upon storms, sea, and sky to smite their foes.

1.name: Bonus Proficiencies
1.description: Gain proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

1.name: Wrath of the Storm
1.description: When a creature within 5 feet hits you, use your reaction to deal 2d8 lightning or thunder damage, Dexterity save for half. Uses equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Destructive Wrath
2.description: Use Channel Divinity to deal maximum damage instead of rolling lightning or thunder damage.

6.name: Thunderbolt Strike
6.description: When you deal lightning damage to a Large or smaller creature, you can push it up to 10 feet away from you.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns, deal an extra 1d8 thunder damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Stormborn
17.description: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed whenever you are not underground or indoors.

choices.name: Tempest Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Tempest Domain subclass
